text_block_list.text:
A few days have gone by since I<n>became Seiun Sky's
trainer.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Trainer, Trainer, did you know?There's a greeeat tide coming intoday! Which means... it's aperfect day for fishing!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh? Do you really need to ask?<n>Hmm, I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
I'd rather work on my wrist flicks<n>than my leg muscles
today. The fish<n>are calling, so let's train tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Man, time flies when you're talkingabout Cat Haven: The PurrcadiaProject! I guess we both lost trackof the time.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Is that the face of someone who<n>wanted to talk about
training instead?<n>Or was I just seeing things? ...Nope,<n>
must've been my imagination!

text_block_list.name: Sky's Classmate
text_block_list.text:
Huh? You're looking for Sei? Actually,<n>you just missed her.
She went home<n>a sec ago.

Despite becoming Seiun Sky's<n>trainer, I haven't made any
progress<n>with her on training at all.

Does she simply have zero desire to<n>work on herself and
win races?

And if that's true, then what am I<n>even here for? Lost in
thought, I<n>continue walking...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. Looks like the rumors about<n>the hopeless rookie
were true.
choice_data_list: If I recall right, you're Seiun Sky's classmate...
If I recall right, you're Seiun Sky's classmate...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I will not allow you to refer to melike some common schoolmate! I amKing Halo, a first-rate racer. You shall mind your manners when youaddress me!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Though... Sigh... From the look ofit, Sky really is walking all over you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
My plan to get you to leak information<n>about Sky has gone
straight to waste!<n>At this rate, I'll lose again... Arghhh!
choice_data_list: To Seiun Sky? Is she really that fast?
To Seiun Sky? Is she really that fast?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huh?! She's not just fast, she's—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
...Hmph! Rather than asking that,<n>you'd be better off seeing
firsthand,<n>don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, I ask Seiun Sky's<n>teacher to let me sit in on
her class.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well, well... it's finally here. The<n>scrimmage, I mean.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That description is woefully<n>insufficient! Today, you will
finally<n>understand how first-rate I truly am!<n>Ohohoho!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Hey, I get it, okay? You're first-rate,<n>all right. Truly amazing.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: You don't mean a single one of those<n>words!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, enjoy it while you can!<n>Because today... Today is the
day I<n>will shut you down and achieve<n>victory!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Shut me down, huh? Oooh, scaaary.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Both Sei and King are real fired up...<n>Okay, Spe. No holding
back!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Is Sky that scary of an<n>opponent? You don't really
hear many<n>good rumors about her, do you?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, recently I've only heard bad<n>things about her. Did you
know she<n>skips training every day?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The scrimmage kicks off in high gear.<n>Leading the pack is...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Wh-what the?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Wait, King is taking the lead?!<n>Doesn't Sky usually race as
a front<n>runner?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Maybe she can't break ahead<n>because her stamina's
gone down<n>from her lack of training... or<n>something? It
makes sense, right?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Urgh, my leg!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. I had heard about her truancy,<n>but for her to have
fallen this far!<n>Perhaps I was a fool for being so<n>wary of
her.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Fine by me. Things are proceeding<n>differently from how I
had imagined,<n>but being first-rate is all about<n>adaptability!
I'll keep this lead all the<n>way to the finish!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
King Halo takes her focus off of a<n>stumbling Seiun Sky and
continues<n>sprinting ahead. The race goes on like<n>this for a
while...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But near the end, King Halo's pace<n>finally starts to slow
down!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff! My stamina... it's...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, King's best as a late surger.<n>For a front runner like
myself, it'd be<n>a real pain if she stuck to my back<n>and
passed me in the final stretch.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: And that's why... I've been waiting<n>for this!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Wait—whaaaaat?! Sky?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Huh? Sky's leading now?! No way,<n>since when?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Wasn't she falling behind because of<n>her lack of training?
Don't tell me...<n>this was all her plan from the start?!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: King made this too easy! Now all<n>that's left—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Not yet. This race isn't over just yet!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The final result: Special Week in first,<n>with Seiun Sky close
behind in second.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
An even later surge for first, huh? Spe<n>really accelerates like
a rocket...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Only got second, though.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It wasn't enough. All that prep, all that<n>planning—

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
W-whoooa! Trainer?! Y-you were<n>here? Since when?
Sheesh, if you're<n>here you gotta say something!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Are you lonely since we never see<n>each other at training?
Man, it's tough<n>being this popular!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but your autograph will have to<n>wait. I'm tuckered
out, so it's time for<n>my afternoon siesta! Duty calls.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seiun Sky leaves me with that line<n>before fleeing the scene
at an awfully<n>fast pace.
